about_the_game:
In the game, you'll play as a cat engineer and travel to different countries such as Hong Kong, Taiwan, Egypt, and more, each with its unique house styles and layouts.

CONNECT CABLE TO LIGHT THE WORLD UP

Place and remove connection to make every house light up. But, be careful and don't overload the electricity, each building would have different maximum supply.

120+ PUZZLE TO COMPLETE

The main levels will take you through around the world, you can feel relax and enjoy the scenery during the puzzle. The puzzle will burn you brain even you smart like the catgineer.

SPECIAL MECHANICS

Use mutiplier can mutiply the eletricity to the building. You can transmission the power by tunnel. Redirect the electricity by using redirector, and tons of feature and spacial mechnics in the puzzle. Bring the light to everyone!!

WHOLESOME VIBES IN FULL OF GAME

The puzzles are difficult but the vibe is wholesome, we have the collection comic book after finish each world.
detailed_description:
In the game, you'll play as a cat engineer and travel to different countries such as Hong Kong, Taiwan, Egypt, and more, each with its unique house styles and layouts.

CONNECT CABLE TO LIGHT THE WORLD UP

Place and remove connection to make every house light up. But, be careful and don't overload the electricity, each building would have different maximum supply.

120+ PUZZLE TO COMPLETE

The main levels will take you through around the world, you can feel relax and enjoy the scenery during the puzzle. The puzzle will burn you brain even you smart like the catgineer.

SPECIAL MECHANICS

Use mutiplier can mutiply the eletricity to the building. You can transmission the power by tunnel. Redirect the electricity by using redirector, and tons of feature and spacial mechnics in the puzzle. Bring the light to everyone!!

WHOLESOME VIBES IN FULL OF GAME

The puzzles are difficult but the vibe is wholesome, we have the collection comic book after finish each world.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Cat Engineer: Light On

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a numerical puzzle game similar to Sudoku and Hashi, but with more different items affecting the numbers. You need to draw blueprints and design a circuit system to ensure that each house has enough power for use, while also avoiding any power surplus.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Greek*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Danish, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Czech, Ukrainian, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Arabic, Azerbaijani, Armenian, Igbo, Sindhi, Sinhala, Quechua, Croatian, Icelandic, Cherokee, Galician, Catalan, Afrikaans, Hindi, Gujarati, Swahili, Kyrgyz, Kazakh, Georgian, Turkmen, Tamil, K'iche', Tajik, Serbian, Sotho, Odia, Welsh, Konkani, Bangla, Amharic, Nepali, Basque, Hebrew, Kannada, Estonian, Irish, Latvian, Tigrinya, Slovak, Slovenian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Tswana, Maori, Wolof, Bosnian, Persian, Telugu, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Belarusian, Kinyarwanda, Luxembourgish, Zulu, Xhosa, Lithuanian, Yoruba, Sorani, Uyghur, Filipino, Mongolian, Scots, Hausa, Dari, Albanian, Assamese, Tatar, Malay, Macedonian, Marathi, Malayalam, Maltese, Khmer
